definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless

sentences.english: Another example would be the language used in Overkill.
sentences.chinese: 另一個例子可能會是《趕盡殺絕》中使用的語言。

sentences.english: The jet of water from the hose soon put out the fire.
sentences.chinese: 救火水管中射出的水很快就把火殺絕了。

sentences.english: To be or not to be . that's the question .
sentences.chinese: 保留仍是殺絕，這是一個問題。

sentences.english: The farmers will not be satisfied till all the local foxes have been hunted down.
sentences.chinese: 直到把當地的狐狸都捕盡殺絕，這些農民們纔會滿意。

sentences.english: In addition, many sea creatures are being wiped out by fishing boats.
sentences.chinese: 此外，捕撈船正在將大量的海洋生物趕盡殺絕。

sentences.english: As a result, he ended up dead, with his family endangered.
sentences.chinese: 結果，他死了，他的家人也幾乎被趕盡殺絕。

sentences.english: Six people, each of them is on the road to self-destruction.
sentences.chinese: 六人，他們每小我是在自我殺絕的道路。
